channel.title: Anyone know how to add Polypore staff?
channel.description: Private message me please a new 317 rsps coming out <3

item.title: Anyone know how to add Polypore staff?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You will need to first get the model and add it to your client (one way is to rip it from rs then convert it to function with your client). Then you will need to handle it in your server, ie when equipped assign to the right slot (should be as easy as adding the item id an array) and also the stat bonuses (again which should be in a file somewhere). Iâ€™m not sure if it has special attacks, but that will be the most challenging aspect of adding it.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to add Polypore staff?
